text: Nimen buyao xiang nage nuren yiyang, ta ba ziji fang hao de sha you chai kaile. Nimen yi shiyan zuowei nimen jian huxiang qizha de shouduan, yimian yizu ren bi ling yizu ren [renkou] geng duo. An la jin yi ci kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo fenqi de [xinshi xinyang an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, buxinyang zhe ze fouren an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, zhe jiushi tamen zai jinshi suo fenqi de].
